summary: The module implements a controller for the preview panel’s visual containers, coordinating Qt widgets that represent data fields, tags and clusters. It provides logic to add, remove, update and persist these elements, manage their visibility, and emit signals to keep the UI in sync with the underlying library model.
business_intent: Enable end‑users of the TagStudio application to interactively view and edit entry metadata within a preview pane, ensuring that modifications to fields, tags and clusters are reflected in the database and the interface.
